BankAccount - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a bank account with functionalities such as deposit, withdrawal, balance retrieval, setting transaction fee, and deducting monthly charges.

Constructs a BankAccount object with the given initial balance and allowed free transactions.

Constructs a BankAccount object with zero initial balance and allowed free transactions.
breed() - Method in class RoachPopulation
Simulates breeding, doubling the roach population.
